title: Slow cooker lentil stew
ingredients: ['2 litres vegetable stock', '200g sliced fresh button mushrooms', '30g dried shiitake mushrooms, torn into pieces', '150g uncooked pearl barley', '150g dry lentils', '4 tablespoons dried onion flakes', '2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '2 teaspoons dried summer savory', '3 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', 'salt to taste']
